chartBuilder

Class ChartBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • csci348.drawings.SimpleDrawing
      • chartBuilder.ChartBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    csci348.drawings.Drawing, java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class ChartBuilder
extends csci348.drawings.SimpleDrawing
    Author:
    Michael Kuczkuda Creates charts using different shapes(Circle, Diamond, Line, Parallelogram, Square, and Triangle). Can change size and color.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class csci348.drawings.SimpleDrawing

        DEFAULT_HEIGHT, DEFAULT_WIDTH, MAX_HEIGHT, MAX_WIDTH

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChartBuilder()
      Creates a new Chart at size 600 by 600
      ChartBuilder(java.awt.Color foreground, java.awt.Color background)
      Creates a new Chart at size 600 by 600 with the shapes being foreground colored and the background is background
      ChartBuilder(int width, int height)
      Creates a new Chart at size width by height
      ChartBuilder(int width, int height, java.awt.Color foreground, java.awt.Color background)
      Creates a new Chart at size width by height with the shapes being foreground colored and the background is background

      • drawTriangle

        public void drawTriangle(int x,
                         int y,
                         java.lang.String point,
                         int width,
                         int height)
        Creates a Triangle with a point at point (x,y) facing point, with a base of width and height of height
        Parameters:
        x - X point of the point
        y - Y point of the point
        point - the Direction the point faces(Takes commands "Up" "Down" "Left" or "Right")
        width - width of the base
        height - height of the triangle

      • drawParallelogram

        public void drawParallelogram(int x,
                              int y,
                              int width,
                              int height,
                              int shift,
                              char type)
        Creates a Parallelogram with point (x,y) being the top left, with size width by height
        Parameters:
        x - X point of top left corner
        y - Y point of top left corner
        width - width of the parallelogram
        height - height of the parallelogram
        shift - shift of the parallelogram from a normal square
        type - whether that shift is in the Vertical or Horizontal(Takes commands 'V' or 'H')

      • drawArrow

        public void drawArrow(int x,
                      int y,
                      int x1,
                      int y1)
        Creates an Arrow from point (x,y) to point(x1,y1) with the arrow at point(x1,y1)
        Parameters:
        x - X point of the first point
        y - Y point of the first point
        x1 - X point of the second point
        y1 - Y point of the second point
